item.title: Peach Salad
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: We like to eat peaches in the summer and this salad with GRILLED peaches hit the spot. It's named the "Grilled Petals from the Past Peach Salad" and includes Terra Preta Farms arugula, grilled red onion, pecans, shaved parmesan, and aged balsamic. The warm, grilled peaches are very, very good. We dined at Dyron's Lowcountry in Crestline Village, Mountain Brook, Alabama. "Petals from the Past" is a local Alabama garden and farm.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Our philosophy is to serve healthy and organic Indian food to the customers. Organic food tastes delicious and it makes sense why it does- healthy soil and plants make food that tastes the best. In a number of studies people who have done taste tests almost always choose the wonderful taste of organic food over processed and food tainted by chemicals. We make every effort to source spices, vegetables, fruits, pulses and chicken from suppliers that organically grow. Most of the ingredients are made from scratch to give you the best taste. We take pride in sourcing our ingredients from "USDA Certified Organic" suppliers and providing healthy and organic Indian food to the customers. Organic food tastes delicious and it makes sense why it does- healthy soil and plants make food that tastes the best. In a number of studies people who have done taste tests almost always choose the wonderful taste of organic food over processed and food tainted by chemicals. We make every effort to source spices, vegetables, fruits, pulses and chicken from suppliers that organically grow. Most of the ingredients are made from scratch to give you the best taste. We take pride in sourcing our ingredients from "USDA Certified Organic" suppliers. Who We Are We will serve you what we are best at and that's authentic North Indian Punjabi food. Our goal is to exceed the taste with healthier options. We have mastered the art of cooking with healthier ingredients without compromising the taste. Our History Serving customers in Delhi and Gurgaon for past decade, we wanted to bring the authenticity to Northern America.
